Experience

  1. Senior Program Manager at Microsoft: Brian Holt has held roles at Microsoft, where he has worked on various projects related to developer tools, cloud computing, and web development technologies
  2. Instructor at Frontend Masters: Brian has been a popular instructor on Frontend Masters, an online platform offering in-depth courses on web development, JavaScript, and related technologies. His courses have garnered praise for their clarity, depth, and practical approach to learning.
  3. Software Engineer at Netflix: Brian Holt has previously worked as a software engineer at Netflix, a leading streaming service known for its innovative use of technology and data-driven approach to content delivery.
  4. Speaker and Educator: Brian is a frequent speaker at tech conferences and events, where he shares his expertise on a wide range of topics, including JavaScript, React, Vue.js, and more. His engaging presentations and workshops have made him a sought-after speaker in the developer community.
  5. Open Source Contributions: Brian Holt has made significant contributions to the open-source community, including projects related to web development frameworks, tooling, and libraries. His work has been instrumental in advancing the state of web development and making tools more accessible to developers worldwide.
  6. Education: Brian Holt likely holds a degree in computer science or a related field, given his extensive knowledge and experience in software engineering and web development. His educational background may include coursework in algorithms, data structures, programming languages, and software engineering principles.
